title: Australian diary. No. 093
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: the paddle-steamer Coonawarra on the Murray River provides visitors with an opportunity to see the scenic wonder of the river; a N.S.W. family are skilled in hobbies and handicrafts making shell necklaces, souvenirs and dolls; huge tractors are built in Australian factory in Rydelmere, N.S.W. and these large earthmoving pieces of equipment are capable of carrying 20 tons at a speed of 30 m.p.h..
